description: This file defines an Angular component called HeaderComponent that renders a top navigation bar with user menu functionality, including logout. It injects authentication and routing services, manages a boolean signal for menu state, and provides toggle and logout methods.

classes.name: HeaderComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that displays a header bar with user menu options including logout functionality.

methods.name: toggleMenu
methods.description: Inverts the current state of the menuOpen signal, toggling the visibility of the user menu.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Calls the AuthService to log out the user, closes the menu, and redirects to the login page.
